plot: When Beth's mother announces her divorce at Thanksgiving dinner, Beth must confront her family's unique way of dealing with the news.
title: Thanksgiving Seconds
plot_es: When Beth's mother announces her divorce at Thanksgiving dinner, Beth must confront her family's unique way of dealing with the news.
plot_en: When Beth's mother announces her divorce at Thanksgiving dinner, Beth must confront her family's unique way of dealing with the news.
